channel.title: 1.2.6 on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: 1.2.6 Patch Installation Instructions
item.description: CSM 1.2.6 Patch Installation Instructions Introduction This document guides an administrator through the upgrade to Cray Systems Management v1.2.6 from v1.2.0. Earlier version of CSM must first be upgraded to at least v1.2.0. For information on how to do that, see Upgrade CSM. Steps Preparation Setup Nexus Upgrade services Verification Complete upgrade Preparation Start a typescript on ncn-m001 to capture the commands and output from this procedure.
